definitions.text: make a proposal, declare a plan for something
examples: the senator proposed to abolish the sales tax

definitions.text: present for consideration, examination, criticism, etc.
examples: He proposed a new plan for dealing with terrorism
She proposed a new theory of relativity
I aim to arrive at noon

definitions.text: put forward; nominate for appointment to an office or for an honor or position
examples: The President nominated her as head of the Civil Rights Commission
he popped the question on Sunday night
she proposed marriage to the man she had known for only two months
The old bachelor finally declared himself to the young woman
